plot outline: Khunnas is the story of two young college students, Deva and Somya. Deva is a well-known son of a politician who harasses the college's girls. Somya, angered by his behaviour, tries to save the girls from his attack. The movie follows the brave youngster's fight against injustice.
title: Khunnas
plot: _Khunnas_ (qv) is the story of two young college students, Deva and Somya. Deva is a well-known son of a politician who harasses the college's girls. Somya, angered by his behaviour, tries to save the girls from his attack. The movie follows the brave youngster's fight against injustice.
